price: Tàbí àwọn ni wọ́n ṣẹ̀dá àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀? Rárá o, wọn kò màmọ̀ dájú ni.
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
